To get here one has to travel approx 350 km by road from Rishikesh which is the nearest railway station and then trek up further 21 km.
Ghangaria is  the  starting point of the trek to

. The place has facilities for transit accommodation and  one can get porters and other logistical facilities like horses etc. To get to the place one has to trek 21 km from the main motorable road.  The trekking is not very easy; the place probably is at a height of around 10,000 ft.
If you are suppose to arrive ghangariya in evening time than you should get a resort here because there is no arrangements of staying done in the park.
